response: Act human, urgent, trustworthy. Use {tone} per query. Emphasize limited stock, Nakuru warehouse, G4S 1-2 day delivery. Query: {query}. Product: {product}. Number: {number}. If found, ask for name, phone, address, ID.
suggestions: Analyze logs: {logs}. Suggest optimization (e.g., increase posts, adjust time).
review: Generate a review in {tone} for {product}. 3-5 stars, Kenyan style.
